participant_1.background:
I try to eat a balanced diet and exercise regularly, but sometimes I indulge in my favorite pepperoni pizza.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.
I love to play with my dog, it makes me feel like a kid again.
i love to go running.
I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.

participant_2.background:
I love to support my local community by buying fresh produce from the farmers market.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago.
i enjoy watching baseball.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.

content.text: I just got back from the farmers market. I love getting fresh produce!
Me too! I love supporting my local community. I also like to know where my food comes from.
I know, right? I also love cooking with fresh ingredients.
Me too! I'm trying to learn how to cook more healthy meals.
That's great! I try to eat a balanced diet, but I also love my pepperoni pizza.
Haha, me too! I love pizza! I also love running.
I love running too! I love the feeling of being outside and getting exercise.
Me too! It's a great way to start the day.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to watch baseball. I'm a big fan of the Chicago Cubs.
Oh, cool! I'm a fan of the St. Louis Cardinals.
Nice! We should go to a game sometime.
